channel.title: [RS2] Paying 4M for Auto Hunter/Lamp Collector
channel.description:
Heres what I need:
1. Auto-Hunt Grey Chinchompas or Red Chinchompas (Lets me choose in the program) 2. Lets me choose how many boxes to put down 3. Anti-Random except for genies 4. Collect lamps and use them on the skill of my choice 5. Greatly amazing anti-ban 6. Anti-Log out
I'm paying 4M for this script.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2007, 02:23:04 PM[/size][hr]Added 1M to the offer. :D
